item.title: Farshid Varno
item.description: Intro I am a Machine Learning Research Scientist and Engineer with a strong technical background and a thirst for building new technologies. I’m a Team player who strives to communicate, share, and achieve as a group. In summary I am: The creator of FedSim Simulator The first inventor of an international patent on Transfer Learning A reviewer for top ML conferences like ECCV, CVPR An ML Research Scientist at Institute for Big Data Analytics A Doctoral Candidate at Dalhousie University and I have:
